entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 8 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
